definition: to fasten/to button/button/buckle/knot/to arrest/to confiscate/to deduct (money)/discount/to knock/to smash, spike or dunk (a ball)/to cover (with a bowl etc)/(fig.) to tag a label on sb/(Tw) (loanword) code
to hand in/to hand over/to seize

sentences.english: The cut-off time for the withholding persons to release the tax shall be implemented in accordance with the above-mentioned two paragraphs.
sentences.chinese: 扣繳義務人解繳稅款的期限，依照前兩款的規定執行。

sentences.english: The responsibility to withhold individual income taxes of the contractor's employees shall remain with the contractor.
sentences.chinese: 承包商的僱員的個人所得稅由該承包商負責扣繳。

sentences.english: The tax payment deadlines for withholding agents shall be governed by the stipulations of the above two paragraphs.
sentences.chinese: 扣繳義務人解繳稅款的期限，依照前兩款的規定執行。
